data.name: Dojo_Intro
data.value: Hwacha! Welcome to Ledian Dojo,[pause=10] where budding students blossom!

data.name: Dojo_Intro_Return
data.value: Is there anything else,[pause=10] my students?

data.name: Dojo_Info_Prompt
data.value: What do you want to know more about,[pause=10] my students?

data.name: Dojo_Info_Prompt_Return
data.value: Do you want to know about anything else,[pause=10] my students?

data.name: Dojo_Info_001
data.value: Hoiyah![pause=0] Ledian Dojo is a place in which you may freely train your body,[pause=10] mind,[pause=10] and soul!

data.name: Dojo_Info_002
data.value: Head to the south and you can choose whether you'd like to train in a maze,[pause=10] take a lesson,[pause=10] or undergo a trial.

data.name: Dojo_Info_003
data.value: As you grow as an adventurer,[pause=10] more mazes,[pause=10] lessons,[pause=10] and trials will become available to you!

data.name: Dojo_Info_004
data.value: Ask me about the facilities if you would like to know about each![pause=0] Oohcha!

data.name: Dojo_Training_Info_001
data.value: Hwacha![pause=0] Training mazes act similarly to mystery dungeons,[pause=10] but are designed for training the body!

data.name: Dojo_Training_Info_002
data.value: The different mazes have different types of Pokémon within them.

data.name: Dojo_Training_Info_003
data.value: Some mazes also have stronger Pokémon in them than others.

data.name: Dojo_Training_Info_004
data.value: Wahtah![pause=0] Be sure to pick the maze that is best for your training needs!

data.name: Dojo_Training_Info_005
data.value: Any items and money in your Treasure Bag will be sent to storage upon entering a maze.

data.name: Dojo_Training_Info_006
data.value: Any supplies you may need can be found within the maze![pause=0] Hwacha!

data.name: Dojo_Training_Info_007
data.value: Besides all that,[pause=10] all the regular rules of a dungeon apply![pause=0] So do your best!

data.name: Dojo_Menu_Back
data.value: Go Back

data.name: Dojo_Menu_Trials
data.value: Trials

data.name: Dojo_Menu_Lesson
data.value: Lessons

data.name: Dojo_Menu_Training
data.value: Training

data.name: Dojo_Facilities_Info
data.value: Facilities Info

data.name: Dojo_Lesson_Info_001
data.value: Hoiyah![pause=0] Lessons are special dungeons that teach adventurers useful knowledge and skills!

data.name: Dojo_Lesson_Info_002
data.value: You will need to employ the techniques they teach to make it to the end![pause=0] Oohcha!

data.name: Dojo_Lesson_Info_003
data.value: Any sort of physical progress that happens within dojo lessons is self contained!

data.name: Dojo_Lesson_Info_004
data.value: Wahtah![pause=0] That is to say,[pause=10] items,[pause=10] experience,[pause=10] money,[pause=10] moves,[pause=10] party members...

data.name: Dojo_Lesson_Info_005
data.value: These are not kept when leaving a dojo lesson![pause=0] Dojo lessons are for learning,[pause=10] not for training!

data.name: Dojo_Lesson_Info_006
data.value: Depending on the lesson,[pause=10] you may need to enter alone and your level may be temporarily adjusted![pause=0]

data.name: Dojo_Lesson_Info_007
data.value: Your proper level and party will be restored upon leaving.

data.name: Dojo_Lesson_Info_008
data.value: Also,[pause=10] any items and money in your Treasure Bag will be sent to storage automatically when entering a lesson.

data.name: Dojo_Lesson_Info_009
data.value: Hwacha![pause=0] All this is necessary so you can properly train your mind!

data.name: Dojo_Trial_Info_001
data.value: Wahtah![pause=0] Trials are special dungeons designed to put your adventuring skills to the test!

data.name: Dojo_Trial_Info_002
data.value: Each trial is different,[pause=10] but presents a unique challenge that only the wise and strong can weather!

data.name: Dojo_Trial_Info_003
data.value: Depending on the trial,[pause=10] your level or party may be temporarily adjusted as part of the challenge.

data.name: Dojo_Trial_Info_004
data.value: Your proper level and party would be restored upon leaving if this happens.

data.name: Dojo_Trial_Info_005
data.value: A trial may also require that you send all items in your Treasure Bag to storage upon entering.

data.name: Dojo_Trial_Info_006
data.value: Hoiyah![pause=0] Why go through all this,[pause=10] you may ask?

data.name: Dojo_Trial_Info_007
data.value: Hwacha![pause=0] To truly challenge yourselves,[pause=10] of course![pause=0] Tough challenges are good for the soul!

data.name: Dojo_Trial_Info_008
data.value: As a bonus,[pause=10] I will bestow upon you a reward for completing each trial for the first time.

data.name: Dojo_Trial_Info_009
data.value: Train hard,[pause=10] my students,[pause=10] and I am sure you will be able to surpass all trials!

data.name: Dojo_Goodbye
data.value: Hwacha![pause=0] Until we meet again!

data.name: Dojo_New_Maze_1
data.value: Wahtah![pause=0] My students![pause=0] New mazes are available for training!

data.name: Dojo_New_Maze_2
data.value: Go train and improve yourselves like you never could before!
